description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Road Trip Sierra-Nevada is a driving game that uses terrain data, aerial photography, and highway GIS data to render the roadway graphics.  A physics engine simulates collisions, but also allows the driver excellent control of the vehicle at high speeds.  You can go as fast as you want, but look out for the slower traffic and other obstacles that may be on the roadway.
